channel.title: Yklsincantations on The Young KL Singers
channel.description: Recent content in Yklsincantations on The Young KL Singers

item.title: Incantations: The Stories In Our Songs
item.description: Speaking of mermaids…did you know that Ulek Mayang is about a battle to save a fisherman from having surrendered his soul to a beautiful sea princess? Every song we will sing in Incantations has a beautiful tale behind it. In this video, the choir gives you a little glimpse at what these stories are. To feel the full magic, come join us October 16-19 @ DPAC. Enjoy the video!

item.title: What's Incantations About? Our Music Director Speaks!
item.description: “You will be mesmerised… Enthralled… You will be drawn into this world that we will be creating for you.” Introducing the ever-passionate Music Director - Chi Hoe!

item.title: Sneak Peek: Incantations 2014!
item.description: Hello everyone! Here’s a glimpse at what YKLS’s got in store for you at our concert this October (KL) and November (Penang). This is possibly the most adventurous music we’ve ever done and we are so, so excited! For more info on the concert, tickets and showtimes, check out the links on the left column.
